name: PacificKitchen+
0:
”Alexa, turn on Pacific”
”Alexa, turn off Pacific”
”Alexa, set Pacific fan speed to 3”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Your Alexa-enabled device can now control select Pacific Kitchen range hoods. Turn on the fan, lights, or enable a delay-off timer all with the power of your voice.
After enabling the Pacific Kitchen Connect skill, you’ll be prompted to log in with your Pacific Kitchen Connect app credentials to connect your Pacific Kitchen hood to your Alexa account. 
After your account is linked, click Discover Devices or ask Alexa to “Discover New Devices”.
In the Alexa app under Device Settings you will find your new Pacific Kitchen Hood device. From here you can control your Pacific Kitchen Hood via the Alexa app or even change the name.
